title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Hezbollah Targets in Mays al-Jabal and Al-Adaisseh: Comprehensive Report”

content.rendered:
IDF spokesperson:

The IDF attacked terrorists who were identified entering a military building of the Hezbollah terror organization in the Mays al-Jabal region.

Earlier today, an aircraft identified terrorists entering a military building of the Hezbollah terror organization in the Mays al-Jabal region, a short time after their identification, fighter jets attacked the building.
In addition, fighter jets attacked a military building used by the Hezbollah terror organization in the Al-Adaisseh region.

The IDF attacked earlier today observation posts in the vicinity of Kfar Kila.

Several launches were identified from Lebanese territory towards the areas of Yiftah, Mount Dov, and Manara, the IDF attacked the launch sources.

Attached is documentation on the subject: https://bit.ly/3PsnY6G
